name: Communications Research Methods
description: The course is a critical survey of research methodologies in the field of communication and media. A central goal of the course is to train students to collect, manage, analyze and interpret social science research data. Each week students are required to attend a one hour in-class lecture and view a one hour online lecture. The online lectures will be posted at least one week before the week in which they are assigned. [24L, 8T]
